extension.news: [B]New[/B][CR]- add new pre-defined widgets[CR]- add setting to hide media flags[CR]- add setting to change whether video info dialog shows details or plot first[CR]- add setting to set a solid colour instead of background images[CR]- add audio and subtitle language information to media flags[CR]- add new seek indicator to audio and video player[CR]- add new scope version[CR]- add first letter scrolling label[CR]- add new never hide music information during playback setting[CR]- add skin settings explanations[CR][CR][B]Improved[/B][CR]- rework of home menu customization dialogs[CR]- improve sort by and sort order toggles[CR]- improve video info dialog (animations and buttons)[CR]- improve alignment and positioning of item count and media flags[CR]- show view toggle only when more than one view is available[CR]- improve info dialogs (more information/layout with video and addon info dialogs)[CR]- update Artist Slideshow integration (v3 update)[CR]- improve OSD animations[CR]- show item count with empty containers[CR]- improve music player during radio playback[CR]- improve visible window elements when busy dialog is active[CR]- let live TV and radio OSD listen to Kodi OSD settings[CR][CR][B]Fixed[/B][CR]- move hide scrollbars setting to skin settings window[CR]- hide MyOSMC home menu entry and widget on non-OSMC systems[CR]- fix overlapping in views with big horizontal titles[CR]- add scrollbar to music album info dialog (if details list is too long)[CR]- fix now playing dialog for radio and live TV playback[CR]- fix kiosk mode behaviour
